2025-08-25.title: Reduced Front Membership!
2025-08-25.location: Read the About > Rec Team > 'How to Set Up Your Membership'
2025-08-25.about: The Front is giving our members this week (August 25–29) to sign up for their reduced membership rate. More information can be found on Discord and in the 'How to Set Up Your Membership' section on the About > Rec Team page.

2025-08-27.title: Info Session
2025-08-27.about: Join us for an info session where we’ll answer your questions and introduce you to the team. This is a great opportunity to learn more, connect with others, and get involved. Pizza will be provided at the end of the event!

2025-08-28.title: First Practice @ The Front
2025-08-28.about: Come join us for our FIRST fall practice! This event is FREE for all Utah Climbing Team members. Sign up and find more details on our Discord!

2025-09-03.title: Second Practice @ BP
2025-09-03.about: Come join us for our SECOND fall practice! Find more details on our Discord!

2025-09-07.title: LAST DAY TO SIGN UP!
2025-09-07.about: Sign-up forms must be completed by the 7th to be added to the Utah Climbing Team roster and receive industry membership rates at Momentum, The Front, and Bouldering Project. You can still join after the 7th and participate in practices, events, and trips, but you will NOT receive the reduced membership rates.
